required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: PANGeA - Physical Activity and Nutrition for Quality Ageing
clinical_study.official_title: Longitudinal PANGeA Mass Measurement - Physical Activity and Nutrition for Quality Ageing

brief_summary.textblock:
General objectives of the project
Defining healthy ageing factors; Setting up content-related bases of the international excellence centre (SLO-ITA) in the field of health of elderly citizens; Raising awareness on the significance of healthy ageing, social inclusion and mobility of less privileged populations (the elderly); Reducing the costs of health care; Connecting the existing health care, social and private entities and improving their mutual coordination.

detailed_description.textblock: Physical activity, dietary habits, social and private entities strongly affect the quality of health and quality of life of the elderly. The main object of this study will be to evaluate physical and cognitive performance in combination with physical activity and dietary habits of the elderly. The investigators are interested in longitudinal monitoring of the elderly that participated in measurements in 2013 and measurements after a decade. The results of this study will give important epidemiological information about physical and cognitive status, health status in combination with physical activity which occurs in a longer period of time.

primary_outcome.time_frame: change in grip strength between two observational time points (pre-post 8-10years)
primary_outcome.description: Grip strength measured using a hand-held dynamometer

secondary_outcome.time_frame: change in gait speed between two observational time points (pre-post 8-10years)
secondary_outcome.description: Gait speed measured for four meters self selected speed

arm_group.description: No specific intervention, pre-post measurements only

intervention.description: No specific intervention, longitudinal (pre-post measurements) only

study_pop.textblock: All males and females who participated in PANGeA mass measurements in 2013 will bi considered in the study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- singed written consent
- age above 60
- healthy
Exclusion Criteria:
- severe musculoskeletal injuries
- inability to follow instructions when performing the test
